by the division commanders, Oster- mann and Sedmorckzki, and all that the peas- ants had has been eaten up. I myself will re- main in hospital at Ostrolenka till I recover. In regard to which I humbly submit my re- port, with the information that if the army re- mains in its present bivouac another fortnight there will not be a healthy man left in it by spring.
